name: Lightwired
description:
Discord: https://discord.gg/9ujAeFC

We're open for any kind of feedback!

CONTROLS

A: Move left
D: Move right
W: Jump (There's double jump)
Hold W in mid air to hover

Left mouse click to shoot energy spheres that explode on impact, which you can use for rocketjumping and gaining speed.
Shooting and hovering costs fuel, which only recharges when grounded.

Do not touch the lasers.

Press R to reload the level.
